name: Incline
description: Praised by real racers, realistic physics recreate the experience of riding the world's fastest motorcycles. Race up to five players from around the world in real-time multiplayer, with bonuses awarded at the end of each session, and generous prizes after every race.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64 equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
